嘐嘐嘐
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

嘐字的基本解释

嘐
xiāo
虚夸。

嘐
jiāo
〔嘐嘐〕a.志大言大的样子，如“其志嘐嘐然”；b.鸡鸣声；c.鼠啮物声或叫声。

嘐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》許交切，平肴，曉。］
(1)自大；骄矜。
(2)同“哮”。
[②]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》古肴切，平肴，見。］
见“嘐2戛”、“嘐2嘐”。

嘐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嘐； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页205第25
【廣韻】許交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】虛交切，?音虓。【說文】誇語也。【集韻】大也。【孟子】其志嘐嘐然。【註】志大言大也。　又【集韻】駭貌。　又【唐韻】古肴切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居肴切，?音交。【玉篇】鷄鳴也。【廣韻】詩云：鷄鳴嘐嘐。○按今《詩》鄭風作膠膠。【正韻】亦作咬。　又【集韻】披交切，音泡。言不實而夸。　又蒲交切，音庖。義同。　又郞刀切，音醪。嘐啁，語多也。　又【集韻】巴校切，音豹。嘐嘐，聲也。　又眉救切，同謬。狂者之妄言也。

嘐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嘐字的起名意思

暂无。

bombastic
Basic explanation of words
bombastic
xiāo
Boastful.
bombastic
jiāo
〔嘐嘐] a. The appearance of great aspirations, such as "its aspirations are loud and loud"; b. The sound of chickens; c. The sound of rat biting objects or barking.
bombastic
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaoqie, Ping Yao, Xiao. ]
(1) Arrogance; arrogance.
(2) Same as "wheezing".
[②]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" ancient dishes cut, flat dishes, see. ]
See "嘐2嘐", "嘐2嘐".
bombastic
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　Di; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 205 to 25
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] [Positive Rhyme] False intersection,? Yin Yu. [Speaking] boasting too. [Ji Yun] Da Ye. [Mencius] His ambitions are loud and clear. [Note] Great aspirations are also great.　[Jiyun] Shocking appearance.　[Tang Yun] Ancient delicacy cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ju delicacy cut, sound intercourse. [Jade articles] The cock crowed. [Guang Yun] Poetry: The cock crowed. ○According to the present "Poetry" Zheng Feng made glue. 【Positive rhyme】also used as bite.　[Jiyun] Phi and cut, sound bubble. It is false and boastful.　Pump and cross cut again, sound 庖. The same meaning.　 Cut with a knife again, sound mor. Hey, there are many words.　[Jiyun] Ba school cut, sound leopard. Boom Boom, sound too.　The eyebrows are cut again, the same is true. The madman's nonsense is also.
